nodes.description: 自杀式爆炸袭击在Peshawar YakaToot的ANP候选人Haroon Bilour集会现场发生，致14人死亡、35人受伤
nodes.support_text: a suicide blast claimed at least 14 lives... moments after Bilour arrived at the venue

nodes.description: Peshawar CCPO Qazi Jamil初步报告死亡11人，后更新为14人，并披露使用8公斤TNT炸药
nodes.support_text: Immediately after the explosion, Qazi Jamil... put the death toll from the blast at 11... over the new couple of hours, rose to 14

nodes.description: 爆炸被确认是自杀袭击，爆炸物在Haroon Bilour抵达会场并准备演讲时引爆
nodes.support_text: Bomb Disposal Squad (BDS) confirmed that the blast was a suicide attack

nodes.description: Lady Reading医院证实35名伤者入院，5人重伤，Haroon Bilour经抢救无效死亡，其子Danial安全
nodes.support_text: Zulfiqar Ali Babakhel...confirmed the death toll from the blast... 35 wounded people were brought to the hospital

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦选举委员会谴责袭击为安全漏洞，要求省级政府加强候选人安保
nodes.support_text: Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) Justice... condemned the terrorist attack and termed it a 'weakness of security institutions'

nodes.description: 各主要政党领袖谴责袭击，包括PTI、PPP、PML-N、PSP等
nodes.support_text: Caretaker Prime Minister Nasirul Mulk and the heads of various political parties denounced the attack on the ANP corner meeting

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击者利用烟花表演作为掩护
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：炸弹袭击者利用烟花表演作为掩护

nodes.description: Geo News 报道了警方信息
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：Geo News 报道了警方信息

nodes.description: Bilour 在会议上发表讲话
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：Bilour 在会议上发表讲话
语义描述：支持者参与烟花表演
语义描述：支持者展示烟花

nodes.description: ANP候选人被安排参选7月25日的PK-78选区选举
nodes.support_text: ANP candidate was scheduled to contest the July 25 elections

nodes.description: 发言人Zulfiqar Ali Babakhel向媒体发表声明
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：发言人向媒体发表声明

nodes.description: 发言人向媒体发布最新伤亡信息
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：发言人向媒体通知

denounced the attack on the ANP corner meeting
